ComicInfo.Summary:
Things come to a boil as Megs and Edward go after Eli, finding some disturbing secrets about the town along the way. It's a race against time as the unlikely duo work against rumors, a growing mob mentality, and even Megs' own family to stop something truly horrible before it happens.
